data.description: Find links in HTML, download them to files
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I'd like to have this root level name in case it makes more sense
    in the future to have:

    use URLToys;

    instead of:

    use WWW::URLToys;

    (which is what I've already requested as the standard name)

    Since URLToys and urltoys.com are all the same entity, I figured
    it'd be good to reserve the namespace for it as well, since it will
    be a Perl module.
